nodes.text: Conflagrine-14 was an extremely flammable gel used in First Order flametrooper D-93 Incinerator flamethrowers.

It was supplied via twin fuel tanks on the flametrooper's backpack and fed with an additional central pressurized propellant tank. Ignited electrically, the gel was launched by a separate propellant gas and could reach a distance of 75 meters.
